description: FlexSMART X2 Mini Bluetooth Audio ReceiverThe ultimate hands-free play and call solution for your Bluetooth enabled smartphone or tablet! Wirelessly connects to your device so you can safely make calls and stream your favorite music through your car stereo system.Pair Up & Plug In!Simply install by plugging directly into the aux port of your stereo sound system or use the included 3.5mm cable & velcro dashboard aux mount. Once you have paired up your devices, you're ready to begin using all your hands-free capabilities!One Touch Voice Command & RecognitionPower up, play music, make and answer calls all through one button! Simply hold the power button for two seconds to activate voice control and command the name of the person you desire to speak with. Press again to end call and return to listening to your favorite tunes!Crisp & Clean AudioThe FlexSMART X2 Mini also comes equipped with a built in noise-cancelling microphone, so now you can talk hands-free AND have your caller hear you loud and clear no matter where you are!Recharge & GO!Taking a road trip and need reliable audio? No problem! The FlexSMART X2 Mini can be used for up to 6 hours of play and is 100% recharged in as little as 1.5 hours! To charge, simply plug in the included USB charging cable into any USB port and you'll be ready to go in no time!Stream Audio From:Tablets: like Apple iPad 4 , ASUS VivoTab Smart & MeMO Pad HD 7 , New Google Nexus 7 FHD , Samsung Nexus 10 , Galaxy Tab 3 & Note 10.1 / 8.0 , Acer Iconica Tab , Microsoft Surface 8 Pro & Surface RTSmartphones: HTC , Motorola , Samsung , LG , Nokia , Apple iPhone , Sony , BlackberryMP3 Players: Samsung Galaxy Media Player , Apple iPod & More Bluetooth Enabled Devices!
